comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I've been wondering about the guy with the money. He might be Stillman Pond who was backing Boyd Raeburn at the time. A photo posted at www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=25658035576&v=wall by Roanne Pond Grasso could be showing the same guy.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: books.google.com/books?id=4WquJV0-XrYC&pg=PA56 suggests that Pond was a "big jolly guy." That could be this guy!!
